tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
player_id INT,
item_name TEXT,
quantity INT,
price DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE transaction_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
player_id INT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP,
transaction_type TEXT,
amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE virtual_currency_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
player_id INT,
currency_type TEXT,
balance DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  condition VARCHAR(50),
  last_used TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  registration_date TIMESTAMP,
  last_login TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE virtual_worlds (
  world_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  world_name VARCHAR(50),
  creation_date TIMESTAMP,
  owner_id INT
)
